item.title: Video Editor for TikTok and Instagram Reels - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor to transform our raw footage into engaging content for TikTok and Instagram Reels. Your main responsibility will be to edit and enhance the footage to create visually appealing and attention-grabbing videos. The ideal candidate should have a strong sense of storytelling and be familiar with the latest trends and techniques on these platforms. You should also have experience in optimizing videos for social media platforms, including adding captions, subtitles, and relevant hashtags.
  Skills required:
  - Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
  - Strong creative and visualization skills
  - Knowledge of TikTok and Instagram Reels best practices
  - Ability to work with raw footage and enhance it with effects, transitions, and music
  - Attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines
  
  This is a small-sized project that can be completed within 1 day. We are looking for an expert -level video editor who can bring our vision to life and create compelling content that resonates with our target audience.

Budget: $20
Posted On: June 21, 2024 04:57 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production, Adobe After Effects
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Instagram Reels Video Editor - Podcast Trailer & Clips - Diary of a CEO style - Upwork
item.description:
Hey, I am hiring for an experienced short form video editor specialised with podcast clips and who can also do the Diary of a CEO style of clip. I have multiple clients who do podcasts so there is potential for plenty of work.

The ideal quality is something as close to what you’d see on the channel “Diary of a CEO” - referring to the trailer. Edits will need to be fast paced, high quality and engaging.

Only apply if you can reproduce this style. You must also be able to communicate effectively and turnaround videos within the deadlines.

Please share 2 examples of podcast trailers you have edited and add the word “clippa” at the top of your proposal to be considered.

Budget: $25
Posted On: June 21, 2024 04:52 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Audio Editing, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Audio Editing, Video Post-Editing
Country: Australia

item.title: Rockstar Video and Audio Editor - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a highly skilled and creative Video and Audio Editor to join our team. The ideal candidate will be experienced in handling a wide range of video and audio editing tasks and will be capable of working under tight deadlines. This role requires someone who can quickly understand project requirements, offer creative input to enhance the final product, and consistently deliver polished results.

Responsibilities:
1. Edit video and audio content for a variety of media including digital and social media.
2. Collaborate with producers, directors, and other team members to understand project requirements and deliver on creative visions.
3. Handle multiple projects simultaneously and adapt to changing priorities and tight deadlines.
4. Utilize state-of-the-art editing software to cut footage, insert dialogue, sound effects, music, graphics, and special effects.
5. Ensure all edited content meets company standards for quality and branding.
6. Provide input on video and audio projects to enhance storytelling through technical means.

Requirements:
1. Proven experience as a video and audio editor in a fast-paced environment.
2. Strong proficiency with editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, Avid, or similar.
3. Excellent understanding of post-production workflows, including color grading, sound design, and compression settings for various media outputs.
4. Strong communication skills and the ability to work collaboratively in a team environment.
5. Creative thinker with attention to detail and a passion for storytelling.
6. Ability to manage time effectively and meet deadlines without sacrificing quality.
7. A portfolio of previous work that demonstrates expertise in both video and audio editing.

Qualifications:
Atleast 3 years of professional editing experience.

What We Offer:
- Competitive salary and flexible work schedule.
- Opportunities for professional growth and advancement.
- A creative and collaborative work environment.
- Access to the latest tools and technology in media production.

How to Apply:
Please submit your resume and a link to your portfolio showcasing your best work. HIRING PROCESS WILL REQUIRE ASSESSMENT TESTS AND TRIAL STAGES.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$20.00
Posted On: June 21, 2024 04:47 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Testimonial Video, Concept Video, Promotional Video, Video Editing, Audio Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Audio Production, Podcast Editing, Video Commercial
Skills: Testimonial Video, Concept Video, Promotional Video, Video Editing, Audio Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing, Audio Production, Podcast Editing, Video Commercial
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video editing food tiktok reels - Upwork
item.description:
Edit cooking/recipe tiktok videos

I provide raw footage (iphone) and a recipe

You provide an edited finished video that matches my fast-paced style of editing... you provide both a finished video file *AND* a DaVinci project file within 24 hours

USD $5 per video

Similar style to these videos: (link removed)

Notes:
• finished video 12-25 seconds (however there can be easily 20-30 minutes of raw footage)
• video typically begins with a finished shot of the food, then a clip of me tasting the food, then the body of the video is the cooking
• video to loop
• there should be no clips where I am looking at the camera (except for the clip where I eat the food or if I am talking to camera)
• leave the cooking sounds in the video. if there is talking, birds, cars or other noise that is not cooking sounds, please turn the volume down for that clip only
• most clips to be 0.5 seconds or less - there can be anywhere from 50-80 small clips in a 20 second video
• try to include smooth transitions between clips where possible (e.g. hand lifting up food from a chopping board, then the next clip is the hands moving to place the food onto a frypan, so it looks like one smooth movement)
• do not speed up or slow down the footage
• refer to my screen recording as an example of how I edit a video (but note that it is only a partial edit - it is the body of the video, it is missing the finished plate of the meal and the tasting footage) (link removed)
• no music
• no captions
• no text on screen

Budget: $5
Posted On: June 21, 2024 04:39 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing
Skills: Video Editing
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Video editing job - Upwork
item.description:
I have a simple video editing job. You need to take the original video and edit it to create about 50 videos. All are virtually the same but you need to change the background of the video (but keep the talktrack as-is). To do that, you need to go a website and record scrolling the whole website and match the scrolling to the talk track.

You NEED to use Camtasia as that's the original video is in. You can use their free version for this job. https://camtasia.com

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 21, 2024 04:38 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Camtasia, Video Editing
Skills: Camtasia, Video Editing

item.description:

item.title: Videographer for Shooting Sports Competition in Marengo, OH Needed - Upwork
item.description:
We're looking for a videographer in or near Marengo, OH, to film a shooting competition in Mesa, AZ., on June 28, 29, and 30 (about 5 to 6 hours per day). Our videographer is out of the country at that time, and we need someone to fill his shoes for the event.

We need to get videos of angles, subjects, and things similar to the following videos:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZlTORpugs8w
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WIzHWxRJvis

We will have 2 competitors who need to be filmed, along with b-roll footage of other competitors, the venue, equipment, etc.

We need one videographer with one camera, preferably a Sony FX3 or something comparable with a gimbal and a rode mic with a dead cat. Having a set of wireless lav mics will come in handy for quick interview-type footage we can splice in between the action shots.

We can provide all the equipment, but we would have to bring everything from California, so we prefer that you have comparable equipment.

There is no need to edit the videos. We just need the raw footage, as we have an editing team.

Please apply if you are available next Friday through Sunday.

Hourly Range: $40.00-$75.00
Posted On: June 21, 2024 04:32 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Sports & Recreation, Videography
Skills: Sports & Recreation, Videography
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: 3D animation for women's health education brand - Upwork
item.description:
We are launching a women's health education platform. Specifically, we are looking for someone to edit long form videos and addition of 3D animation. The final video will be 2-4 minutes long and contain a total of 1-3 minutes of animation. Medical animation skill is a plus here. You also need to lead artistic direction from video briefs

We plan to launch a video weekly on social media platforms, so ability to complete the work quickly and efficiently is important.
